segments.text: Oh no, the sink is overflowing uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading down onto the floor in sheets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't noticed; she's too busy with her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is wet, and she could slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at that boy climbing the stool to the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is splayed out, about to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching right into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her hand up, waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so dangerous; what if he falls?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing, making everything slick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the window's breeze doesn't knock him off balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies might not be worth this risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone has to intervene before an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
